actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Walnut Street Theatre, a national landmark, for inclusion as a national historic site in Independence National Historical Park, Philadelphia, Pa.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Walnut Street Theatre for inclusion as a national historic site in Independence National Historic Park, Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Walnut Street Theatre, a national landmark, for inclusion as a national historic site in Independence National Historical Park, Philadelphia, Pa.
